Dear {candidatename}
Thank you for taking the time to interview for the {job} position. We enjoyed getting to know you. We have completed all of our interview processes. We are pleased to inform you that we would like to offer you the position of {job}. We believe your past experience and skill(s) will be an asset to our company. Your starting salary will be GHC:{salary}.00 with an anticipated start date of {startdate}. Please follow this {link} to download your offer letter, your Unique identifier is {applicantid} or the phone number provided to us during the interview process. we look forward to hearing from you.

Sincerely, {hrname} {hrposition} {hremail} {company}.
in_review:
Dear {candidatename}
Thank you for showing interest in working with {company}. Your CV has been received. At {company}, we pride ourselves on hiring the best so bear with us as we review your application. Please note, due to the high number of applications, we are unable to offer everyone an interview. If you have not heard from us within 2 weeks of receiving this email, consider your application unsuccessful this time around. However, we will keep your application in our database and reach out when we have a position that is better suited. If shortlisted for an interview, an email will follow with details, please treat this with importance and respond in a timely manner. However, you can be checking your application status by clicking on this {link}, your Unique identifier is {applicantid}, or the phone number provided to us during the interview process. Best Of Luck.

Sincerely, {hrname} {hrposition} {hremail} {company}.
